level.heading: Uniformity of application and construction.
level.text: This chapter shall be applied and construed to make uniform the law with respect to trade secrets among the District of Columbia and those states enacting it.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 7-216, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 36-401.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon § 8 of the Uniform Trade Secrets Act. See 14 Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on WESTLAW.
